description: Increases all party members' max HP by 25% of their max HP, lasting for 30m. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
bgDescription: During the period of material shortage, Angelica was used by the people of Huanglong as an important medicine to resist the cold. After the production of synthetic drugs was restored, the habit of drinking Angelica tea to resist the cold was retained and gradually developed into the current Angelica Tea.
